app_descript:
App Name: Warplane Inc.

Brief: Dive into the gripping sky battlefields of Warplane Inc., a shooter and wargame that combines tense hostilities between two fictional states with a deep narrative that intertwines war and love. As a pilot, you're summoned to take flight in an atmospheric WWII setting, navigating through a vividly-crafted war inc. game with top-notch psychological elements and dynamic surface-to-air combat mechanics. Prepare for a thrilling array of historical aircraft and spectacular air battles that bring the drama of the Second World War right to your fingertips.
